                        Teatro Porto Seguro, São Paulo
                    </div></div></div></a></div><script type="text/javascript">(function(global){var lineHeight=function lineHeight($element){var paddingTop=parseInt($element.css('paddingTop'),10),paddingBottom=parseInt($element.css('paddingBottom'),10),lineHeight;$element.css({whiteSpace:'nowrap',overflow:'hidden',textOverflow:'ellipsis'});lineHeight=$element.innerHeight()-paddingTop-paddingBottom;$element.css({whiteSpace:'',overflow:'',textOverflow:''});return lineHeight;};var initModule=function(){var $text=$('.modulo-local-agenda-de-shows__nome'),paddingTop=parseInt($text.css('paddingTop'),10),paddingBottom=parseInt($text.css('paddingBottom'),10),textHeight=$text.innerHeight()-paddingTop-paddingBottom;$text.css({maxHeight:2*lineHeight($text)}).dotdotdot();};var moduloAgendaDeShowsInit=function moduloAgendaDeShowsInit(){if(!$.fn.dotdotdot){var src='http://s.glbimg.com/gl/cd/libs/';var getCachedScript=function(url,callback){callback=callback||function(){};$.ajax({url:url,dataType:"script",cache:true,success:callback});};getCachedScript(src+'jQuery.dotdotdot/1.7.4/jquery.dotdotdot.min.js',function(){initModule();});}else{initModule();}};if(global.glb.CardLocalVersion&&global.glb.CardLocalVersion>=1.8){global.glb.CardLocalReady=global.glb.CardLocalReady||[];global.glb.CardLocalReady.push(moduloAgendaDeShowsInit);}else{moduloAgendaDeShowsInit();}})(window);</script></div><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 18:39:19 --></div></div></div><footer class="card-local-footer gui-card-footer"><a data-track-click="clique | tudo sobre" href="http://g1.globo.com/sao-paulo/" class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link js-card-local-region-link card-local-footer">

        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-fa49192c-892a-44bc-8bc5-8fa223d5cf45');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos glb-hl-style-card-videos-g1--globo-news" id="card-de-videos-cbf0afaf-be38-4be3-9402-8d890855f8d5"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"

                    data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"/></div><p data-track-click="clique | thumb texto | posicao 1" class="card-de-videos-item-wide-text">Com 384 gols e 25 títulos, Falcão faz o seu último jogo oficial pela seleção de futsal</p></div></a></div></div></section><footer class="gui-card-footer"><a data-track-click="clique | veja mais" class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link" href="http://g1.globo.com/globo-news/" title="">
            veja mais vídeos da globonews
            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-cbf0afaf-be38-4be3-9402-8d890855f8d5');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://g1.globo.com/pr/parana/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="paraná">

            VEJA MAIS VÍDEOS DO LOLLAPALOOZA
            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8ff4de77-b230-4267-b4c1-29c0b7a1d065');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><section data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="lista" class="gui-card card-lista"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 class="gui-text-title"><a data-track-click="clique | titulo" href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="LOLLAPALOOZA EM FOTOS">
                    LOLLAPALOOZA EM FOTOS
                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/lollapalooza-2017-shows-do-domingo-fotos.ghtml" title="The Weeknd, Strokes, Two Door e mais estrelas do 2º dia (Marcelo Brandt/G1)" class="card-lista-item-wide-link"><div class="card-lista-item-wide gui-image-hover"><figure data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"

                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content meio-highlights"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/politica/blog/andreia-sadi/post/mendes-pode-pautar-para-semana-que-vem-acao-sobre-dilma-e-temer.html" class="card-opiniao-item "><div class="card-opiniao-foto"
             data-track-click="clique | foto | posicao 2"><img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/it5HujSq5TY21BlBzzmxA2OiKJ8=/0x0:1010x1010/90x90/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/02/01/andreia-sadi.jpg" width="90" height="90"

                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><style>

.agrupamento-vertical-simples .glb-hl-style-informe-publicitario .chapeu {
    color: #fff !important;
}

.nano>.pane {
    z-index: 12;
}
</style><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    window.onload= function() {
         if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
     }
})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 27/03/2017 18:26:00 --></html>

                </script>

            </div>
          </div><!-- end #r7service-header -->
        </div>
      </div> <!-- end .module_name-ads -->

  <script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
      var time = null,
          targetItem = $('.target-item');

      function hideShareIcons () {
        targetItem.fadeOut();
        $('.r7opened').removeClass('r7opened');
      }

      $('.open-item').hover(function() {
        var self = $(this);

        if(!self.hasClass('r7opened')){
          hideShareIcons();
        }
        clearTimeout(time);

        self.find('.target-item').stop(true, true).fadeIn("fast");
        self.addClass('r7opened');
      }, function(){
        time = setTimeout(hideShareIcons, 500);
      });

      var $searchBar = $('.header-menu-horizontal-search-bar'),
          $socialAndSearchHide = $('.header-menu-horizontal-social-items, .header-menu-horizontal-send-video'),
          $topVideoFilter = $searchBar.find('.r7-top-video-filter');

      $(document).on('click', function(e) {
        var t = $(e.target),
            mod = 'header-menu-horizontal',
            ignoredClasses = [mod + '-search-bar', mod + '-search', 'open-search-bar', 'search-icon', 'r7-top-video-main-form', 'r7-top-video-filter-opener', 'r7-top-video-input', 'r7-top-video-btn'],
            hasClass = true;

        _.each(ignoredClasses, function(item) {
          if(t.hasClass(item)) {
            hasClass = false;
          }
        });

        if (hasClass) {
          $searchBar.hide();
          $topVideoFilter.removeClass('is-visible');
          $socialAndSearchHide.removeClass('is-hidden').addClass('is-visible');
        }
      });

      $('.open-search-bar')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e) {
          e.preventDefault();
          $searchBar.show();
          $socialAndSearchHide.addClass('is-hidden');
        });

      var checkInput = function() {
        var t = $(this), label = t.parent().find('label');

        if (t.val().length > 0) {
          label.fadeIn();
        }
        else {
          label.fadeOut();
        }
      };

      $('#login-input, #pass-input').on('focus blur keyup', checkInput);

      $('.search-action')
        .die('click')
        .on('click', function(e){
          return $('.header-menu-horizontal-search').val().length > 0;
        });

      var offset = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').offset().top;

      $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset', offset);

      var $window = $(window);

      $window.scroll(function(){
        var stickyShareTop = $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').attr('data-offset');
          scrollTop = $window.scrollTop();
          if (scrollTop > stickyShareTop) {
            $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('#header-menu-horizontal:not(.sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info:not(.bg-sticky)').addClass('sticky');
            $('.pre-main-content:not(.sticky)').addClass('bg-sticky');
          }
          else {
            if ($('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').hasClass('sticky')){
              $('#header-menu-horizontal .header-menu-horizontal-nav').removeClass('sticky');
              $('#header-menu-horizontal').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.header-menu-horizontal-top-info').removeClass('sticky');
              $('.pre-main-content').removeClass('bg-sticky');
            }
          }
      });
    });
  </script>



    <div class="body-holder">
      

      <div class="main-holder  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite ">

          <div id="r7ad-bgLeft">
            <script>
             r7ad.printGAds([204,792], {pos:"bg", context:"left"}).success(function() {
               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

          <div id="r7ad-bgRight">
            <script>
             r7ad.printGAds([204,792], {pos:"bg", context:"right"}).success(function() {
               r7adv.has_bg = true;
             });
            </script>
          </div>

        <div class="pre-main-content">

           
          <div id="main" class="r7container-8  is-blog-main  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite  is-blog-main is-generic-hotsite " data-browser-name="firefox">
            <div>
             
            </div>


              <div id="content_scheme" class="r7container-7 content_scheme">
                    <div id="heading" class="r7cl7 ref-blog">
          <script type="text/javascript">
    googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      if ((event.slot.getTargeting('pos') == "bg")){
        if(!event.isEmpty){
          r7adv.has_bg = true;
        }
      }
    });

    $(function() {
      postscribe('#r7-skyscraper-sidebar', '<script>if ((r7adv.has_bg != true) && r7adv.allowSkyscraper()){ r7ad.printGAds([120, 600],"skyscraper"); }<\/script>');
    });
  </script>
    <div class="r7-adv-skyscraper scrollable" id="r7-skyscraper-sidebar">
      
    </div>



    </div>

      <div class="row r7section-row ">
          <div class="column r7cl5 ">
            <div>
                  <div class="box rw playlist_cinco_colunas" id="box_5544f0f808c6bb5355000f11">

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
$( document ).ready(function() {

      // console.log('.pop-chamada-duas-colunas-menor-54aefa76090cdabe1d01fe5c .destaque-social-icon');
      $('#pop-chamada-duas-colunas-menor-54aefa76090cdabe1d01fe5c .destaque-social-icon').on('click', function(e) {
        e && e.preventDefault();

        var options = 'width=600,height=300,menubar=no,location=no,resizable=no,scrollbars=no',

                  <div class="box rw r7tv_show_carousel" id="box_55db9a48490f8cbeaf001069">
                    <div class="r7tv-show-carousel">
  <h2></h2>
  <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-content">
    <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-nav r7tv-show-carousel-nav-left">
      <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-nav-arrow"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-holder" id="r7tv-show-carousel-holder">
    </div>
    <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-nav r7tv-show-carousel-nav-right">
      <div class="r7tv-show-carousel-nav-arrow"></div>
    </div>
  </div>

<script>
  $(function () {
    function notEmptyId (item) {
      return !!item.id.length;
    }

    $.ajax({
      url: 'https://snippets.r7.com/snippet/55db9456cba42f4ef700000b',
      dataType: 'jsonp',
      jsonpCallback: 'R7TvShowCarouselJsonp',
      cache: true,
      success: function (data) {
        var items = _.filter(data.itens, notEmptyId);

        R7TvShowCarousel({
          mountpointId: 'r7tv-show-carousel-holder',
          items: items,
          callback: function () {
            var baseClass = '.r7tv-show-carousel';

            R7CarouselTv({
              baseEl: baseClass,
              scrollerEl: baseClass + '-scroller',
              itemEl: baseClass + '-item',
              navEl: baseClass + '-nav',
              navArrowEl: baseClass + '-nav-arrow',
              prevEl: baseClass + '-nav-left',
              animationDelay: 200,
              noScrollClass: baseClass + '-noscroll'
            });
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

                  </div>

      playlists: playlists,
      root: $('#r7tv-playlist-gallery-550b66720d9a03b83b000e2f'),

      mountpointId: '550b66720d9a03b83b000e2f',
      alonso_url: 'https://img.r7.com',

      callback: function (that) {
        var baseClass = '.r7tv-playlist-gallery';

        R7TvPlaylistScroller({
          baseEl: '#r7tv-playlist-gallery-550b66720d9a03b83b000e2f',
          scrollerEl: baseClass + '-scroller',
          itemEl: baseClass + '-item',
          navArrowEl: baseClass + '-nav-arrow',
          leftArrowEl: baseClass + '-nav-left',
          that: that,
          playlistLength: that.state.playlistBackup.length,
          itemsPerPage: 5
        });
      }
    });
  });

</script>

<script>
  $(function () {
    var playlists = JSON.parse("[{\"title\":\"The Love School - \u00c9 S\u00f3 um Caf\u00e9\",\"id\":\"569d515a6c4db252e200b10e\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Abrindo o jogo\",\"id\":\"55db99916745eebafc002114\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Escola do Amor Responde\",\"id\":\"55db93396745eeaff6001148\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Reality do Amor \",\"id\":\"55db91986745eeaff6001121\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Supervirtuosa\",\"id\":\"55db8f4c596f99cf58008bce\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Resumo da Semana\",\"id\":\"55db8e9f596f99cf58008bb6\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Papo de homem\",\"id\":\"558dcd13c28077ea8600727d\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Reprovado no Teste\",\"id\":\"558dcc44c28077ea86007252\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Ningu\u00e9m \u00e9 Perfeito\",\"id\":\"54c2e059a4fd54e46c00bb51\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Laborat\u00f3rio\",\"id\":\"54c2d76ba4fd54d8e700cffb\"},{\"title\":\"The Love School - Cruzeiro Love School\",\"id\":\"54c2d115a4fd546af801344d\"}]");

    R7TvPlaylistGallery({
      boxId: '551980c91d4206c67b009a59',
      playlists: playlists,
      root: $('#r7tv-playlist-gallery-551980c91d4206c67b009a59'),
      thumbUrl: 'https://cms-media-api.r7.com/playlist/',
      mountpointId: '551980c91d4206c67b009a59',
      alonso_url: 'https://img.r7.com',

      callback: function (that) {
        var baseClass = '.r7tv-playlist-gallery';

        R7TvPlaylistScroller({
          baseEl: '#r7tv-playlist-gallery-551980c91d4206c67b009a59',
          scrollerEl: baseClass + '-scroller',
          itemEl: baseClass + '-item',
          navArrowEl: baseClass + '-nav-arrow',
          leftArrowEl: baseClass + '-nav-left',
          that: that,
          playlistLength: that.state.playlistBackup.length,
          itemsPerPage: 5
        });
      }
    });
  });

</script>

        <!-- Tracking -->
  <script type="text/javascript">
    // criando elemento para url canônica
    var linkCanonical   = document.createElement('link');
    linkCanonical.href  = "" || location.href;
    linkCanonical.rel   = "canonical";

    (function() {
      // adicionando metatag referente a url canonica dentro da tag <head/>
      document.head.appendChild(linkCanonical);

      //GOOGLE ANALYTICS UNIVERSAL 
      (function(i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
          i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;
          i[r] = i[r] || function() {
              (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
          }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();
          a = s.createElement(o),
              m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];
          a.async = 1;
          a.src = g;
          m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
      })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

      ga('create', 'UA-10631407-1', 'auto');

      //evita ReferenceError
      dataLayer = (typeof dataLayer !== 'undefined')? dataLayer : {};
      if(dataLayer.page_name         ) {ga('set', 'dimension1',  dataLayer.page_name         );}
      if(dataLayer.site_section      ) {ga('set', 'dimension2',  dataLayer.site_section      );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section       ) {ga('set', 'dimension3',  dataLayer.sub_section       );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_2     ) {ga('set', 'dimension4',  dataLayer.sub_section_2     );}
      if(dataLayer.sub_section_3     ) {ga('set', 'dimension5',  dataLayer.sub_section_3     );}
      if(dataLayer.content_id        ) {ga('set', 'dimension6',  dataLayer.content_id        );}
      if(dataLayer.content_type      ) {ga('set', 'dimension7',  dataLayer.content_type      );}
      if(dataLayer.content_title     ) {ga('set', 'dimension8',  dataLayer.content_title     );}
      if(dataLayer.publication_date  ) {ga('set', 'dimension9',  dataLayer.publication_date  );}
      if(dataLayer.page_url          ) {ga('set', 'dimension10', dataLayer.page_url          );}
      if(dataLayer.short_url         ) {ga('set', 'dimension11', dataLayer.short_url         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_age         ) {ga('set', 'dimension12', dataLayer.tailt_age         );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_gender      ) {ga('set', 'dimension13', dataLayer.tailt_gender      );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_city        ) {ga('set', 'dimension14', dataLayer.tailt_city        );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_state       ) {ga('set', 'dimension15', dataLayer.tailt_state       );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_country     ) {ga('set', 'dimension16', dataLayer.tailt_country     );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_profiles    ) {ga('set', 'dimension17', dataLayer.tailt_profiles    );}
      if(dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    ) {ga('set', 'dimension18', dataLayer.tailt_subjetcs    );}
      if(dataLayer.minute            ) {ga('set', 'dimension19', dataLayer.minute            );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_photoGallery) {ga('set', 'dimension20', dataLayer.embed_photoGallery);}
      if(dataLayer.embed_poll        ) {ga('set', 'dimension21', dataLayer.embed_poll        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_quiz        ) {ga('set', 'dimension22', dataLayer.embed_quiz        );}
      if(dataLayer.embed_playlist    ) {ga('set', 'dimension23', dataLayer.embed_playlist    );}


      dataLayer.reset_content_id = function(content_id) {
        dataLayer.content_id = content_id;
        ga('set', 'dimension6', dataLayer.content_id);
      }
      dataLayer.reset_content_type = function(content_type) {
        dataLayer.content_type = content_type;
        ga('set', 'dimension7', dataLayer.content_type);
      }

      ga('send', 'pageview');

      var adblock_status = (Boolean( document.getElementById( 'ads-container-r7adv' ) ))? 'OFF' : 'ON';
      ga('send', 'event', 'Adblock', 'Adblock-'+adblock_status, {nonInteraction: true });
    })();
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    if (typeof window.R7HashAudience != 'undefined') {
      window.R7HashPath = 'https://adv.r7.com/audience.js?s=' + window.R7HashAudience;
      document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="' + window.R7HashPath + '"><\/scr' + 'ipt>');
    }
  </script>

     var _ttconversion = _ttconversion || [];
     _ttconversion.push(['_channel', 'r7tv-loveschoolescolaamor']);

    <script>
      //submenu nao deve ser menor do que o menu pai
      $(".r7-nav-menu-secondary-list").each(function(index){
        var child_width = $(this).outerWidth(),
            parent_width = $(this).closest('.r7-nav-menu-list-item').outerWidth();

        if(child_width < parent_width) {
          $(this).width(parent_width);
        }
